name: Multiplayer TopDown Shooter
description:
UPDATE:

V5 will be the biggest update, with more guns, health bars, and some powerups. 

V0.4: Added theme, new spawn
V0.2: Added a UI, 3 levels now , controls on above the UI

Player1: is green, and controlled by the WASD keys.  Space Bar to shoot.

Player2: is brown, controlled by the arrow keys, and click the mouse to shoot(NOTE:

The mouse must be on the game canvas for it to shoot.
